body:
Comment 14: 
> Well, if anyone else were to import the package, they would import it using the path
to its source under GOPATH.  I suggest we use that same path when building it as a
command.

That would give the wrong result.  That would mean that the main package that runs and
an imported (main) package were the same package.  That is not what we want.  An
imported main package is just an ordinary package.  It is not the special main package
that is the program being run.
